title: AI-based Breast Cancer Screening System
description:
• Developed a webpage utilizing DenseNet, Streamlit, and SQL to classify mammogram images into BI-RADS categories
• Attained over 70% validation accuracy and validation loss of 2.6, an acceptable value in similar literature

title: Brain Machine Interface Analysis Project
description:
• Directed a group of four to create an algorithm that predicts hand position based on neural activity in MATLAB
• Achieved an RMSE value of 13, which ranked among the top 5 highest scores in the competition

title: Autonomous Cart Pole Balancing System
description:
• Trained a Deep Q-Network to autonomously balance a pole on a cart by applying directional forces, optimizing for maximum stability and longevity of balance which achieved one of the top scores
• Implemented a 64-neuron two-layer architecture, Adam-W optimizer, and ReLu activation for optimized performance

title: Simple Rendering Engine
description:
• Designed an interface using OpenGL to render shapes and objects specified by the user
• Created a camera using geometric equations to rotate/transform objects and create lines and shapes by linking geometric coordinates

title: Maglev based Railway Track-switch
description:
• Designed a railway track-switch based on electromagnetic suspension for higher efficiency and durability
• Formulated both linear and non-linear mathematical models employing state space modelling to control variables for stability and movement, resulting in a 65% increase in the speed of the track-switch through simulations
